subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* [[Index:Chinese radical/阜]] {{qualifier|as left radical}}
* [[Index:Chinese radical/邑]] {{qualifier|as right radical}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* <big>阝</big> is the component form of two distinct radicals found either on the left or right of a character. It is the component form of {{l|mul|阜}} when used on the left of a character, as in {{l|mul|阮}}, and the component form of {{l|mul|邑}} when used on the right of a character, as in {{l|mul|邧}}.

[[Category:CJKV radicals]]
